Rafael, desde que tenía 15 años de edad, aprendió el oficio de albañilería, es por eso que tiene mucha experiencia en esa área, de esa manera ha logrado obtener suficientes ingresos, para poder salir adelante con los gastos de su familia.

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar tres cerdos para cuidarlos, engordarlos y a los seis meses poder venderlos.

Rafael, sueña con ver a sus hijas graduadas como profesionales y que puedan ser una persona para el servicio de la sociedad.
texts.en:
Rafael, who is 37 years old, is married. He and his wife have two children. His oldest daughter is 18 years old and is studying for her high school degree. His younger daughter is 14 and is in ninth grade. Every day they work hard to be able to cover the educational expenses of their daughters.

When he was 15 years old, Rafael learned the masonry trade. Because of this, he has a lot of experience in this area. In this way he has managed to obtain sufficient income to be able to continue meeting the expenses of his family.

He needs the money from the loan to buy three pigs in order to care for them, fatten them, and be able to sell them in six months.

Rafael dreams of seeing his daughters graduate as professionals  and be able to be people in the service of society.

loans.use: to buy three pigs to care for, fatten, and be able to sell in six months.

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.en:
Nicolasa has been running a general store for many long years, earning well to sustain her living. She had sustained the business and with her generated income, she was able to pay her previous loan used for the business successfully. Improving her business is easier with her access to GDMPC. 

Recently, she took a new loan to buy additional grocery goods to sell. She plans to use the additional profit, generated by the business, to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru: Это Ахмад, житель прекрасного города Худжанд. Ему 31 год, он женат и имеет 2-х детей. Уже 5лет он занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота. К своей работе Ахмад относится со всей ответственностью, так как животные также нуждаются в хорошем уходе. В этом деле ему помогает его супруга. Для расширения своего бизнеса Ахмад обратился за кредитом. Он очень верит, что с Вашей помощью он сможет закупить еще несколько голов скота и обеспечить себя и свою семью всем необходимым.
texts.en: This is Ahmad, a resident of the beautiful city of Khujand.  He is 31 years old, married, and has 2 children.  He has worked raising cattle for 5 years, and sees his job as a great responsibility, since animals need to be well taken care of.  His wife helps him in his work.  Ahmad requested a loan in order to expand his business - he believes that with your help he can purchase several head of cattle and can provide for the his and his family's necessities.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and provide for his family

loans.name: Rosabella

texts.en:
Rosabella is 52 years old and has three children. She's married but her husband has already passed away. She operates her general store to make a living. She has been doing this for more than ten years and she earns well from this activity. 

Recently, Rosabella took a new loan from GDMPC to buy more goods to sell. Rosabella finds ways to save money to improve the general store in order to give her children a better education. She wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en:
Francisco lives in Liquisa. He is married and he is a businessman. He is applying for a loan of $1,000 USD from Tuba Rai Metin to improve his business. He has a shop for his business and his shop is in center of the market, so many people come to buy from it. Francisco has been involved in business activities since 2006. He started with his own working capital of $200. He is earning a good income from selling items in his business so he is still happy to do his business. 

He is taking this loan because he wants to add more items including slippers, sugar, hand and body items, cooking oils, noodles, milks, shampoo, candles, soft drinks, hard drinks, and other things to sell

loans.use: to buy slippers, sugar, hand and body items, cooking oils, noodles, milks, shampoo, candles, soft drinks, hard drinks, and other things to sell

loans.name: Thoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Thoeurn, 57, is a married father of four dependent children; three among them are in school while the other one is too young to attend school. They are living in the Siem Reap province. Growing rice, fishing and working for others for a fee have been the sources of his family’s income for 39 years and allow him to save about 7 USD each day for emergency needs. Due to a lack of working capital to start up a new business, he is now leading a group to apply for a Kiva loan via VisionFund.  

In the group of three, he is a group leader and he is willing to use his loan portion to buy piglets and pig feed for raising pigs for sale, in order to increase his income. For Thoeurn, this is the six loan cycle for him and those previous loans have helped him to have better living conditions and improve his ability to send his children to school. He is very hopeful that this new loan portion will help him increase his income so that he will be able to buy school materials for his school children to support their studying.

loans.use: to buy piglets and pig feed for raising

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Prasat Bakong district

loans.name: Ngek

texts.en:
Ngek is a 53-year-old widow with a daughter. She is a cleaner at a clinic and resides in a village in the Siem Reap province of Cambodia. Ngek has been a cleaner since 2013. Her daughter earns the primary income, from a tailor shop. Ngek and her daughter can earn approximately 9 USD per day. 

Now she would like to request a loan to buy a plot of land. With the loan, she will have enough money to buy the land. In the future, she is going to save money to run a small grocery store at home and build a new proper house.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La socia  Antonia   se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura, ella es un persona trabajadora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para su terreno de cultivo.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Antonia continues to work in agriculture. She is a hard-working person who wants to get her family ahead through her business. Her dream is to expand her agriculture business.

Antonia is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for her plot of crops. She is happy with the loan and promises to comply with the installments of her loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her plot of crops.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: María es una mujer trabajadora de 49 años de edad que vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su hija de 14 años de edad, la cual logro adquirir hace 8 años. María vive de su negocio de elaboración de prendas de vestir, actividad que le permite sostener la economía de su hogar, por lo que se siente feliz de poder brindar el sustento a su hija, ya que es madre soltera y su negocio es la única fuente de ingresos económicos con la que cuenta. La vivienda de María está hecha de láminas viejas, las cuales por su estado de deterioro ya no brindan mayor seguridad, por lo que ella buscando lo mejor para su familia, solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y alambre para cambiar las láminas de las paredes y techo de su vivienda y brindar seguridad a su hija.
texts.en:
Maria is a hard-working woman of 49 who lives with her 14-year-old daughter in a house that is her own property and that she managed to acquire 8 years ago. Maria lives from her business of making articles of clothing, a business that allows her to sustain the economy of her household. She feels happy to be able to offer sustenance to her daughter, since she is a single mother and her business is the only source of economic income that she has.

Maria's house is made of old metal sheets that because of their state of deterioration no longer offer great security. Because she is seeking the best for her family, she is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and wire in order to replace the metal sheets of the walls and roof of her home and offer security to her daughter.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized metal sheets, wood, and wire in order to replace the metal of the walls and roof of her house and offer security to her daughter.

loans.name: Ma. Luisa

texts.en:
Ma. Luisa is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. 

Ma. Luisa dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money so that she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Gulbarchyn

texts.ru: Гулбарчын, 39 лет, замужем, мама 3 детей. Образование у нее высшее, работает в детском саду воспитателем. В 1994 году Гулбарчын начала свой бизнес в разведении скота и полеводстве, использовав стартовую сумму в 3,500 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Она сумела развить свое хозяйство, с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме до 19,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день, в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы. На 0,60 Га земли выращивает клевер. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулбарчын обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для обработки почвы и выращивания органической фасоли. В ближайшее время, при помощи доходов от кредита, Гулбарчын планирует и дальше развивать свой бизнес.
texts.en: Gulbarchyn is 39 years old, married, and a mother of 3.  She has a higher education and works as a kindergarten teacher.  In 1994 Gulbarchyn started her own business raising cattle and farming, starting with a sum of 3,500 KGS, which she used to purchase livestock.  She has been able to grow her business, which provides her with a monthly income of 19,000 KGS.  She now has 2 cows and a 0.60 hectare plot of land on which she raises clover.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Gulbarchyn turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 40,000 KGS to purchase fertilizer to cultivate the soil and to raise organic beans.  In the near future, with the help of income from the loan, Gulbarchyn plans to continue to develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and to raise organic beans

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena has been involved in business activities for a few years; she started with her own working capital of $ 500.00. Her life, every day, involves selling gasoline because she earns a good income from this business. Additionally, she lives near many people, so they come to buy her gasoline every day. As a result, she is still happy to do her business. 

Magdalena has a small business, so she is requesting a loan of $1,000 USD from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. When Tuba Rai Metin offered the loan for her, she said that with this loan, she can improve her business. She is happy with the offer from Tuba Rai Metin to help change her business.

loans.use: to buy gasoline

loans.name: Airyn

texts.en:
Airyn is 38 years old, married and has 5 children to provide for. To earn a living, she engaged in the food vending business. She started the business five years ago. 

She wants to increase her income so she availed a loan from GDMPC to buy raw ingredients to prepare food for sale. This will allow her to keep her business open in order to continue serving more variety to satisfy her customers' tastes and needs. This loan will result in higher sales and a higher income for Airyn. By doing this, she will have more financial stability and can enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her new recipe

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred is 38 years old, married, and has one child who is in school. 

Mildred is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Mildred requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Mildred has been farming rice for ten years now, and has borrowed twelve times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Mildred would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Ines

texts.en:
Ines built her house a few years ago, with her own working capital. Until now, it has not been completed, because there is not enough money to buy materials. So now she is requesting a loan of $1,000 USD from Tuba Rai Metin to buy more materials such as sand, brick, cement, iron, nails, wood and other materials to use. 

She is very hopeful with the loan offered from Tuba Rai Metin and she hopes that with this money she can complete her house in a short time.

loans.use: to buy sand, brick, cement, iron, nails, wood and other materials to use

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa, de 55 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela, pero su madre le enseño a hacer arreglos florales; cuando tenía 20 años se casó y junto a su esposo procrearon tres hijos que con sacrificios lograron sacarlos adelante. 

Rosa, desde que tenía sus 12 años se ha dedicado a trabajar haciendo arreglos florales, por medio de la realización de este oficio logró superarse y proveer todo lo necesario para sus hijos.

Ahora Rosa, necesita el préstamo para comprar material para hacer arreglos florales, porque a partir de Septiembre se venden mucho y en el mes de Noviembre se celebra el día de los santos difuntos y ya que tiene muchos arreglos florales encargados para ese mes, es por eso que necesita los materiales para comenzar a elaborarlos y tenerlos listos para cuando se los pidan. 

Rosa, desea seguir trabajando elaborando arreglos florales, porque es un trabajo que le gusta y que disfruta mucho.
texts.en:
Rosa, who is 55 years old, did not have the opportunity to go to school, but her mother taught her to make floral arrangements. When she was 20 years old, she married, and she and her husband have three children whom, with sacrifice, they succeeded in raising.

Since she was 12 years old, Rosa has worked making floral arrangements. Through this work she managed to better herself and provide the necessities for her children.

Now Rosa needs the loan to buy material to make floral arrangements, because many are sold after September. In the month of November, All Saints' Day is celebrated, and since she has many floral arrangements ordered for this month, she needs the materials to begin to make them and have them ready for when they are requested.

Rosa wants to continue working making floral arrangements because it is work that she likes and that she enjoys a lot.

loans.use: to buy material to make floral arrangements.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ls socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia y venta de queso,la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de ganaderia y venta de queso.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un ganado y quesos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This [communal bank] member continues working in the business of raising cattle and selling cheese. She is a hard-working woman who is raising her family by means of this business.

Her dream is to expand her business of raising cattle and selling cheese. She is applying for a loan to purchase a cow and cheese. 

She is happy about the loan and promises to make the payments on her account.

loans.use: to buy a cow and cheese

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.es:
La socia Vanessa  se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cria cuyes y gallinas, la socia es una persona trabajadora que por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y también alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
[Communal bank] member Vanessa works in the business of raising animals. She raises guinea pigs and hens. She is a hard-working person who is raising her family through this business. 

Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell the animals. 

She is applying for the loan in order to purchase guinea pigs and hens as well as feed for the animals. She is happy about the loan and promises to make the payments on her account.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs and hens as well as feed for the animals.

loans.name: Eduesa

texts.en:
Eduesa is 42 years old, married, and has two children to provide for. She owns and operates her farm to earn a living. In order to help her husband in providing for her family's needs, she engaged in rice production. She plants rice and sells it to the market. She aims to increase her income because of the increasing price of commodities nowadays. 

So, she decided to borrow a loan to purchase fertilizer for the rice farm. This way, she can produce a good quality of rice and can deliver more rice in the market, generating more income. Eduesa's plan for the future is to save money from her business income to sustain the needs of her family as well as the educational needs of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her rice farm

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en:
Marjorie is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a 21,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional goods to sell in her store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Marjorie dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell in her store

loans.name: Bendita

texts.en:
Bendita is involved in agriculture and she sells fruits. She is requesting a loan of $700.00 USD to improve her business. She will use this loan to buy more fruits in other places. After she buys, she will bring the fruits to her house to resell. Because she lives near main roads, many traveling past can come to buy her fruits. 

She started selling fruits in 2014 with her own working capital of $25.00. Now, she is taking this loan from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to buy more fruits such as bananas, oranges, mangoes, and other fruits to sell. Everyday her life involves selling fruits because she is earning a good income from it.

loans.use: to buy bananas, oranges, mangoes, and other fruits to sell.

loans.name: Veronica Maite

texts.es:
La socia Veronica Maite se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
[Communal bank] member Veronica Maite works in the business of selling groceries. She sells products of basic necessity such as rice, sugar, milk, and crackers. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. She has already had this business for 5 years, and it is going very well for her. 

Her dream is to expand her grocery store business. 

She is applying for the loan in order to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and crackers. She is happy about the loan and promises to make the payments on her account.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and crackers.

loans.name: Erlina

texts.en:
Erlina is 51 years old, married, and has four children to raise. She earns income through selling food in her community. She has been doing this for many years. She always wants to augment their situation to provide an improved living standard for her family. 

Without hesitation, Erlina is borrowing a loan amount to buy more items, such as soft drinks. She is a new member of GDMPC and with her access toGDMPC, her goal of improving her business will become easier.

loans.use: to purchase more items, such as drinks, to sell

loans.name: Tom's Group

texts.en:
Tom is a rice farmer living in the Siem Reap province. He is a 40-year-old father of four dependent children, one of whom is too young to attend school while the other three are in school. To overcome his family’s hardship, he grows vegetable and works as a construction worker to earn additional income to support his farm’s living. He has been involved in these businesses for five years and it earns him about 11 USD per day. 

Tom has been an existing borrower of VisionFund for five cycles already and completely paid back the past loans. Those previous loans helped him to improve his living condition and have enabled enough household consumption to complement his family’s basic needs. Since he does not have enough water to fulfill his farmland, his crop has not grown well and it earns him a very low income. Now he is leading a group of three members to take a new loan and he is willing to use his entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pay for plowing fees to increase the crop yield. He hopes this loan will help him to generate more income so that he can keep sending his children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to increase the crop yield and generate more income so that he can keep sending his children to school

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Prasat Bakong district

loans.name: Shamshad

texts.en:
Shamshad is a 54-year-old lady, living with her spouse and five children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

She wants to have some savings so that she can provide better living facilities to her children, but it seems impossible in the absence of a profitable source of income.

Her son has been driving a moto rickshaw for several years; his income is insufficient to feed his entire family. He has to maintain the rickshaw’s body, but he does not have sufficient cash in hand to fix the problem. 

Therefore, Shamshad has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her son would be able to buy the moto rickshaw's body. 

She hopes that she would be able to save enough money until the time comes for her children to marry in the future.

loans.use: to buy a new moto rickshaw body for her son's transportation services

loans.name: Port's Group

texts.en:
Port, a rice farmer living in the Siem Reap province, is a 41-year-old mother of five dependent children, four of whom are school children. Growing vegetables and working construction are the additional sources of her family’s income. She has been involved in these businesses for 23 years. 

Recently, her rice farming business was threatened by insect pests; this caused her to earn a very low income and it is really hard to support her big family. Due to a lack of working capital, she is now leading a group of two to take this first Kiva loan via VisionFund to buy seeds and fertilizer to grow her crop healthily, which will allow her to sell for a higher price. She hopes to generate more income and be able to keep sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to grow her crop healthily, to sell for a higher price, so that she can gain additional profit to spend on her children's school fees

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Prasat Bakong district

loans.name: Herizo Nantenaina

texts.fr:
Herizo Nantenaina est une femme travailleuse de 33 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants âgés de 4 et 7 ans. Ces derniers sont tous scolarisés dans une école privée.
Comme activité génératrice de revenu, son mari exerce une activité de vente de pneus et elle dirige un magasin général depuis 2001 et mutuellement les deux époux gère ensemble un élevage porcin. 
Elle est avec CEFOR depuis 3 ans et elle n'a jamais eu de problème dans le remboursement. Elle demande un autre nouveau prêt pour continuer à développer et étendre le magasin général. Son objectif est que ce  petit magasin deviendra un magasin de vente en gros et elle voudrait proposer d'autres genres de marchandises comme des fournitures scolaires et fournitures de bureau, des ustensiles de cuisine etc...
texts.en:
Herizo Nantenaina is a hard-working woman, 33 years old, married, and the mother of two children, 4 and 7 years old. The children are both in a private school.

For revenue-generating work, her husband has a business selling inner tubes. She herself has been running a general store since 2001. The couple jointly raise pigs.

Herizo Nantenaina has been with CEFOR for three years, and she has never had a problem repaying loans. She is asking for a new loan to continue developing and expanding her general store. Her goal is for her little store to become a wholesale outlet. She would like to offer other types of merchandise, such as school supplies, office supplies, kitchen utensils, etc.

loans.use: to purchase bags of sugar, animal feed, corn, and rice, containers of cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Pech

texts.en:
Pech, an 63-year-old man with seven children, earns a living by farming in Chhoung village. Spending day and night raising seven children, Pech is reaching the time to retire. Six of his children have grown up and created their own families. Now he is living with his wife and his youngest child. Pech wants to have a comfortable life. Currently he is still continuing to farm and helps his child's business. 

Pech has difficulty using a battery for home energy. He needs to recharge the battery every week since his son has to go to the farm. Seeing the difficulty of using a car battery, he decided to apply for a Kiva loan to buy solar home energy. He believes solar home energy can enhance his lifestyle in a comfortable condition.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system

location.town: Chhoung Preal Village, Toek Hot Commune, Rolea Pe

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for solar home system.

loans.name: Glory Mar

texts.en:
Glory Mar is a married woman with one child who attends school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Glory Mar has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business. She has been in business for two years.

In the future, Glory Mar would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Yat's Group

texts.en:
Yat is age 62 years old and a mother of five children, two of whom are in school, living in Siem Reap province.

Growing rice and raising pigs are the sources of her family’s income, for 15 years. Drought and her pigs getting ill are the main challenges for her in earning income to support her family.

Due to not having enough working capital for this season, Yat is leading a group of four members to apply for this first Kiva loan via VisionFund.

As a group leader, Yat is will use her loan to buy pig feed and to pay for curing her pigs. She hopes this loan will help her grow her pigs health and enable her to sell them at a higher price.

Yat works to increase her income to pay her children’s school fee and for study materials.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and pay for pigs curing.

location.town: Siem Reap district, Siem Reap province

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est une femme mariée âgée de 46 ans qui habite à Baguida. Mère de quatre enfants, Afi est une marchande des céréales qu’elle achète une fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile pour gagner des revenus. Pour commander des bols de farine de manioc et  d’arachide, Afi nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et mieux couvrir les frais scolaire de ses enfants dès la rentrée à venir.
texts.en: Afi is a married woman, 46 years old, living in Baguida. The mother of four, she sells grains, which she purchases once a month at the market and resells in front of her home to earn in income. To put in an order for tubs of cassava flour and of peanuts, Afi needs these funds to finance her inventory and realize a good profit margin. She could then meet family needs and do better at covering her children’s schooling costs at the start of this academic year.

loans.use: to purchase 200 tubs of cassava flour and 45 tubs of peanuts

loans.name: Channa

texts.en:
Channa and her husband run a feeding farm and live in Kraing Leav Village with their two children.

Channa runs a feeding farm at home and takes care of children while her husband works as a motor bike mechanic.

Channa needs bright light to feed pigs in the early morning and at night. Similarly, her husband also needs bright light to fix his customers' motors when the sky is dark.

However, their current battery is not reliable. It has short life span and is easily damaged. Sometime car battery runs out during night time, which disturbs their business.

After getting a good recommendation from neighbor that uses solar home systems, Channa decided to apply for a KIVA loan to buy a solar home systems. She believes this decision will improve her business and save utility fees.

loans.use: to pay for solar home system.

location.town: Kraing leav Village, Kraing Leav Commune,Rolea Pe

loans.name: Momo

texts.fr: Mère de deux enfants, Momo est une femme mariée âgée de 49 ans. Momo réside à Baguida et est une marchande de produits alimentaire. Momo achète ses marchandises au marché quatre fois par mois et les revendent dans sa boutique à domicile et dans les quartiers environnant. Momo sollicite ce crédit pour commander le sac de riz, de maïs et de bidon d’huile. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Momo va pouvoir aider son mari dans l’éducation de ses enfants et dans les charges quotidiennes éprouvées par sa famille.
texts.en: The mother of two, Momo is a married woman, 49 years old, residing in Baguida. She sells grocery items and purchases her merchandise at the market four times a month. She resells in the shop at home and in nearby districts. Momo is requesting this loan to put in an order for sacks of rice and corn and containers of oil. With the resulting profit, she is going to be able to help out her husband in covering her children’s education and the family’s proven day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of rice, a sack of corn, and a container of oil

loans.name: Zavra

texts.en:
Zavra lives in the N. Khursav region. She is 48 years old and married with children. She lives with her husband and children and works at home in animal husbandry.

Zavra has a small number of livestock. She wants to improve her situation and plans to expand her business by buying a pair of animals to increase her income.

Zavra doesn't have enough money to do this so she is looking for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Jazmín Paola

texts.es: Jazmín de 27 años es una empresaria independiente que reside en el municipio de Chocontá en compañía de su pequeño hijo de apenas tres años de edad.  Ella inició su negocio de venta de productos de belleza estando embarazada, puesto que necesitaba generar ingresos para su sustento al ser próximamente madre soltera, así que consideró que esta actividad no le implicaría estar sujeta a horarios, ni grandes esfuerzos, por lo que vio en esta labor una fuente de ingreso que se acomodaba a sus condiciones. Hoy en día cuenta con cuatro años de experiencia en la venta de estos productos con una clientela fidelizada que en su gran mayoría son vecinas, amigas y compañeras de trabajo de su mamá.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer crédito con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en artículos del catálogo; cremas corporales, perfumes, joyería y demás pedidos de sus clientes.  Esta inversión es muy importante para el eficaz funcionamiento de su negocio, puesto que su capital le es insuficiente para responder oportunamente a las solicitudes de sus clientes.  Su meta a futuro es poder adecuar un local donde tenga mayores ventas y así brindarle a su hijo una excelente calidad de vida.  En lo personal espera conseguir la cuota inicial para su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jazmin, who is 27 years old, is an independent businesswoman who lives in the municipality of Chocontá along with her little son who is barely three years old. She began her business of selling beauty products when she was pregnant, since she needed to generate income for her sustenance, since she was a single mother. Thus she thought that this business would not involve her being tied to a schedule, nor great sacrifices, and so she saw in this work a source of income that was adapted to her conditions.

Now she has four years of experience in the sale of these products, with a loyal customer base of whom the great majority are neighbors, friends, and co-workers of her mother. She is now applying for her first loan with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation in order to invest in catalog products: body lotions, perfumes, jewelry, and other requests of her customers.

This investment is very important for the efficient functioning of her business, since her capital is insufficient for her to respond in a timely manner to the requests of her customers.

Her goal for the future is to be able to set up a shop where she would have greater sales and thus offer her son an excellent quality of life. Her personal goal is to have the down payment for her house.

loans.use: to invest in catalog products: body lotions, perfumes, jewelry, and other requests of her customers.

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Agée de 28 ans, Amélé est une femme mariée et sans enfant. Amélé réside à Baguida et exerce comme activité la vente des produits alimentaire tels comme le cube, la potasse blanc ou rouge. Amélé achète ses marchandises quatre fois par mois  au marché et les revendent en se promenant dans les quartiers et à son domicile. Amélé demande ce crédit pour commander des paquets de cubes et des sachets de potasses blancs et rouges. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Amélé pourra renforcer son activité et venir en aide à sa famille.
texts.en: Amélé, aged 28, is a married woman without any children. She resides in Baguida and has a business selling supplies, such as [bouillon cubes], white potash, and red potash. She purchase her merchandise four times a month at the market and resells in her home and by going from area to area. Amélé is asking for this loan to put in an order for packets of cubes and bags of white and red potash. With the resulting profits, she will be able to bolster her business and help out her family.

loans.use: to purchase 4 packets of bouillon cubes, 10 bags of white potash, and 7 bags of red potash

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Abla est femme âgée de 33 ans qui vit à Baguida. Mariée et mère de quatre enfants, Abla est une marchande de produits alimentaires et des céréales qui s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché et le revend à sa devanture de son domicile et de quartier en quartier. Abla désire ce crédit pour financer son achat de sacs de maïs, de riz et des bidons d’huile en vue de tirer profit et gagner plus de revenus afin de mieux contribuer aux charges de la famille.
texts.en: Abla is a 33-year-old woman who lives in Baguida. The married mother of four, she sells grocery items and grains, which she resupplies herself with four times a month at the market. She resells in front of her home and by going from neighborhood to neighborhood. Abla would like this loan to finance her purchase of corn, rice, and oil with the aim of making a profit and earning more income, so as to do more to help cover family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn, a sack of rice, and 2 containers of oil

loans.name: Chanleak

texts.en:
Chanleak works as a farmer and also owns a small feeding farm in Prey Sampao Village with her husband and little child.

Her husband works as a company employee and earns a fixed income.

Chanleak has to get up early to feed her pigs and also take care of her child. She wants to have reliable energy to light her family living space and farm and also for her little child's safety.

However, the car battery is not reliable. Sometime the battery runs out without noticed. She has no choice but to stay in pitch black until morning; which disturbs not only her lifestyle but also her business.

Therefore, Chanleak is applying for a KIVA loan to buy a solar home systems. With a solar home systems, she doesn’t have to be concern about sudden power outages anymore.

loans.use: to pay for solar home system.

location.town: Prey Sampao Village, Pro Snoeb Commune,Rolea Pe Ea

loans.name: Noeurn

texts.en:
Noeurn, a farmer and fisherman, lives in Choung Preal village with wife and two children.

Noeurn farms everyday and takes some time go to do fishing during peak season.

Noeurn's wife works as factory worker and helps his farm during her free time.

Noeurn and his wife are concern about their children safety because they use a car battery that has acid inside their house and they need to go to work everyday.

Moreover, Noeurn has to charge the car battery every day for daily usage. It is a time and money consuming activity.

Therefore, he decided to apply for a KIVA to buy a solar home system. After using a solar home system he will feel relief because he have no worries about his children safety. His family also can live with a bright light.

loans.use: to pay for solar home system.

location.town: Chhoung Preal Village, Toek Hot Commune, Rolea Pe

loans.name: Santa Fe Group

texts.es:
Nelida es una mujer  de 30 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 4 hijos de 3, 6, 9 y 12 años, y su negocio es la artesanía en sombreros de sao.
Ella es buena madre, dedicada y muy generosa. Su trabajo lo realiza en el barrio ‘plan 3000’ área poblada por los damnificados del desborde del rio, actualmente zona de manufactura y produccíon en todas las áreas. 
Nelida es morena, de baja estatura y físico delgado (al centro, viste polera manga larga azul y pantalón negro). Su lengua materna es el guaraní y habla español. Su negocio es la confección de sombreros de sao, estos se fabrican con la rama de la palmera de ‘Sao’, son muy tradicionales y se utilizan bastante para cubrirse del sol, “nuestra artesanía es la única actividad que generé ingresos en la comunidad, por eso le dedicamos todo nuestro tiempo…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que se vende en su totalidad, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de material de trabajo como; ramas de palmera, hilos, pegamento, tela y otros. Su sueño es mejorar sus ingresos, ella desea realizar la compra de material de confección de sombreros de sao para trabajar de manera constante. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 18 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Nelida solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de confección de sombreros de sao.
texts.en:
Nelida is 30 years old. She lives with her partner and has 4 children of ages 3, 6, 9 and 12. Her business is the handcraft of sao hats.

She is a good mother, caring and generous. Her work is conducted in the neighborhood of 'plan 3000’ area which is populated by the victims of the river flooding. It is currently a manufacturing and production zone.

Nelida has dark complexion, short and thin (center, wearing blue long-sleeved turtleneck and black pants). Her native language is Guarani and she speaks Spanish. Her business is the manufacture of sao hats. They are made with ‘sao’ palm tree branch. They are very traditional and used often to cover from the sun. "Our craft is the only income-generating work in the community so we spend all of our time", she says.

The advantage of the business is that she sells out. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to purchase materials such as palm branches, wires, glue, fabric and others. Her dream is to improve her income. She wants to buy materials to manufacture sao hats for steady work. This is the first cycle of loan with the institution in 18 years of work.

Nelida requests a loan to buy material to manufacture sao hats.

loans.use: to buy materials to manufacture sao hats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her tuition fees so she can earn her degree in pharmacology.

loans.name: Tambacoumba Group

texts.fr: le banc villageois a été inauguré le 19 octobre 2001. Ce groupe est composé de femmes qui s'activent dans le commerce. Madame Hawa qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 25 ans et mère de quatre enfants dont deux fille. Depuis plus de cinq années elle s'active dans la vente de boutique villageoise. Le prêt va lui permettre de renforcer sa marchandise. Elle a une bonne maitrise de son activité et une clientèle fidèle. les bénéfices vont servir à aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en: The 'banc villageois' was inaugurated on October 19, 2001. This group is composed of women who are active in commerce. Ms. Hawa, at the right in the photo with a hand raised, is the group's representative. She is married, 25 years old, and the mother of four children, including two girls. For over five years, she has been active selling in rural shops. The loan will enable her to bolster her merchandise. She has a good mastery of her business and a loyal customer base. The profits will be used to help out her husband in cover day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to resell

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is very interested in the business and not overly dependent on the husband to be responsible in their household.

So Jacinta is requests a loan of $ 1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy more goods such as noodles, cooking oils, aqua, eggs, sugar, sardines, detergents, ketchup, sauces, soft drinks and other things to sell.

The first time Jacinta opened her business in 2013 she had a capital base of $ 1,500.

She has a big store and she is taking this loan still to improving her management for her business.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cooking oils, aqua, eggs, sugar, sardines, detergents, ketchup, sauces, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Engracia

texts.en:
Engracia is a business women and she is very interesting in doing more business. She is requesting a loan of $1,500 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business.

She will use the loan to buy supplies to sell in her kiosk such as biscuits, card gambling, cigarettes, shampoo, soft drinks and hard drinks.

Engracia opened her kiosk in 2007 with her own working capital of $400.

She live in the capital city so many people come by her store every day.

Engracia is happy with the loan offered from Tuba Rai Metin and she hopes to earns more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia fishes for crabs.

In the picture above, you can see fishing gear made of bamboo, nylon thread and screen on top of a pump boat. This is a crab trap commonly known as “panggal” in Iloilo, Philippines.

Crab traps are created in different shapes and sizes. Fishermen leave these traps submerged in the sea for several hours, then they come back to pull up and hope that crabs are inside.

This is the kind of business that Amelia operates. She makes panggal for sale, while her husband, Mario, catches crabs himself using panggal and a pump boat. Together they work hard to provide for the needs of their family, with four children.

This season is favorable for Amelia and her husband, because crabs are very abundant during the months of July to October. Although crabs can be caught all year round, they are more abundant these days.

Amelia needs PhP 12,000 to buy rolls of screen and nylon threads that she will to make panggal, and pay for plywood and paint that are necessary to repair their pump boat. Later on, she will buy another pump boat that she can rent out to her neighbors.

Hopefully Amelia can gain additional profit for her children’s education. It’s Amelia’s desire to see her children finish their studies and have a brighter future.

She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God. *All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy rolls of screen and nylon threads, plywood and paint.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Maria de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de especies desde hace 30 años, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal y posee muchos clientes, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas especies (achiote, ajonjoli, oregano, mostaza, etc.) todo por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
Maria is 50 years old and lives in her own house with her spouse. She has made a living selling condiments for 30 years. Her business is located in the city market and has many customers. With her earnings, she manages to solve some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more condiments (annatto, sesame, oregano, mustard, etc.) at wholesale cost to continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy more condiments (annatto, sesame, oregano, mustard, etc) at wholesale cost.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is married and opened her own shop in 2005 with her own working capital of 500 USD. Her husband has been very supportive through the years as she has built up her store to a good size.

Elsa has applied for a loan of 1500 USD through Kiva's field partner Tuba Rai Metin to buy additional merchandise to sell such as hand and body soaps, candles, perfume, candies, hair oils, ointments, medications, sardines, cigarettes, and both soft and hard drinks, among other things.

Elsa will be glad to have this loan, as she will be able improve business and make more in income.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Cristobal Armando

texts.es: Don cristobal de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su nieto, el se dedica desde hace 30 años a la venta de dulces de coco, mani salado y dulce, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas mercaderia por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Cristobal is 55 years old and lives at home with his grandson. He has been working for 30 years selling coconut candies, salty peanuts and sweets. His business is located near his home. His earnings provides for his household expenses.

Cristobal requests a loan to buy more wholesale merchandise to continue the sales which will lead to better income.

loans.use: to buy wholesale coconut candies, salted peanuts and sweets.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Con 43 años de edad María se caracteriza por su espíritu emprendedor, ella habita en casa de su propiedad desde hace 15 años junto a su esposo, su hijo de 19 años de edad y un nieto de 16 años de edad. María se dedica a prestar sus servicios de forma domiciliar en una residencial cercana, actividad que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. María desea construir un cuarto en su vivienda, ya que esta es muy pequeña, además de contar con láminas demasiado deterioradas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para construir un cuarto en su vivienda mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
At the age of 43, Maria is known for her entrepreneurial spirit. She lives in her home of 15 years with her husband, 19 year old son and 16 year old grandson. Maria provides domestic services in nearby homes. This work allows her to sustain her home.

Maria wants to build a room in her home because it is very small and the panes are too damaged. She requests a loan with FUSAI to invest in galvanized steel, wood and nails to build a room in her home. This will improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized steel, wood and nails to build a room in her home, in order to improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.name: Juleta

texts.en:
Juleta is married and has three children. For the past three years she has sold secondhand clothes in a busy location to earn an income. She feels content having her own business to run and earning money every day.


Juleta has applied for a 1500 USD loan through Kiva's field partner Tuba Rai Metin to buy more used garments such as shirts, trousers and shorts to sell. She feels proud to be an independent businesswoman who can be responsible for herself and help her family. She hopes to have a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more used garments such as shirts, trousers and shorts to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products such as soft drinks, juice, and candy.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Adjo est une femme mariée âgée de 40 ans qui vit à Baguida. Ayant trois enfants à charge, Adjo  s’efforce  pour gagner son revenu  en revendant des produits alimentaire.  Pour s’approvisionner, Adjo se rend quatre fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des paniers de tomates fraîches, des bassines de piments verts et des bidons d’huile rouge, Adjo nécessite ce prêt pour financer son approvisionnement. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Adjo  va pouvoir aider son mari dans les charges quotidiennes de la famille et favoriser l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en: Adjo is a married woman, 40 years old, who lives in Baguida. With three children to support, she strives to earn an income by selling grocery items. To stock up on merchandise, she goes four times a month to the market. To order baskets of fresh tomatoes, tubs of green chili peppers, and containers of red oil, Adjo needs this loan to finance her supplies. With the resulting profits, she will be able to help her husband to cover the family’s day-to-day expenses and support her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase 7 baskets of fresh tomatoes, 6 tubs of green chili peppers, and 20 containers of oil at 1.5 liters per container.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Akouvi est une femme mariée âgée de 48 ans résidant à Baguida avec deux enfants à charge. Akouvi tisse et revend des nattes pour subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants grâce au bénéfice de son activité. Akouvi s’approvisionne une fois  par mois au marché et désire commander le nécessaire pour le tissage de ses nattes. Avec la marge la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Akouvi pourra soutenir son mari dans les charges  de la famille et permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Akouvi is a married woman, 48 years old, residing in Baguida with two children in her care. She weaves mats and sells them to support her children, thanks to the profit from her business. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. Her wish is to put in a special order for the necessary items for weaving mats. With the resulting profit, Akouvi will be able to support her husband in covering family expenses and to allow her children a good education.

loans.use: to purchase 10 loads of material

loans.name: Khady Gueye

texts.fr:
khady fait parti d'un banc villageois depuis sa création.Elle est une femme dynamique et exemplaire.Elle est âgée de 56ans.Elle est marié et mère de4 enfants dont 2 garçons.

Elle fait du petit commerce de tissus et des boubous qu’elle achète dans la sous région.Elle mène cette activité depuis plus de 15ans.Elle a beaucoup d'expérience.C'est pourquoi elle arrive à écouler ses produits facilement.

Avec le crédit,elle compte acheter 100000f de lait en poudre,100000f de tissus et 100000f de boubous.

Avec les bénéfices,elle va renforcer son épargne pour une parie et l'autre va servir à améliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Khady has been part of the 'banc villageois' since it was created. She is an energetic and exemplary woman, 56 years old, and the married mother of four children, including two boys.

She has a small-scale businesses involving fabrics and boubous [long, flowing clothing], which she purchases in the area. She has been in this business for over fifteen years. She has a lot of experience. This is why she manages to sell her products easily.

With the loan, she intends to purchase 100,000 francs of powdered milk; 100,000 francs of fabrics; and 100,000 francs of boubous.

With the profit, she is going to bolster her savings, as well as use it to improve her children’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, boubous, and milk

loans.name: Jose Matilde

texts.es: José es un hombre trabajador de 50 años de edad que se dedica desde hace muchos años a la venta de granos, actividad que desarrolla desde hace muchos años, por lo que cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus productos. José logro hace 11 años construir su vivienda, en la que vive junto a sus 3 hijos un varón de 13 y dos niñas de 9 y 3 años de edad. José desea invertir en su negocio de venta de granos básicos, ya que no logra cumplir con la demanda de productos que le solicitan, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: maíz, frijol, arroz, etc., para mejorar su negocio y cumplir con los pedidos.
texts.en:
José is a hardworking man who is 50 years old. He has been working for many years selling grains, an activity that has taken many years to develop. Now, he has a lot of customers who ask for his products.

Eleven years ago, José built his home, in which he lives with his 3 children: a 13-year-old son and 2 daughters, aged 9 and 3. José would like to invest in his business selling basic grains, because now he cannot meet the demand for the products that are being asked for. For that reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in: corn, beans, rice, etc., to improve his business and fulfill his orders.

loans.use: to invest in: corn, beans, rice, etc., to improve his business and fulfill his orders.

loans.name: Tambacoumba Group

texts.fr: Le banc villageois a été inauguré le 19 octobre 2001. Ce groupe est constitué de vingt membres qui ont toujours remboursées leurs prêts avec succès. Elles s'activent dans le petit commerce. Madame Mariama qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 49 ans et mère de douze enfants dont sept fille. Depuis plusieurs années elle s'active dans le commerce. Elle va acheter avec le prêt sollicité des oignons, du sucre, du savon, du riz et d'huile. Madame est une femme très dynamique et très brave. Les bénéfices vont servir pour la prise en charge de sa famille et d'épargner.
texts.en:
The 'banc villageois' was inaugurated on October 19, 2001. This group is composed of twenty members who have always paid back their loans successfully. The group members are active in small-scale commerce.

Ms. Mariama, at the right in the photo with a hand raised, is the group's representative. She is a widow, 49 years old, and the mother of twelve children, including seven girls. For several years, Mariama has been active in commerce. She is going to use the loan requested to purchase some onions, sugar, soap, rice, and oil. She is a very energetic woman who is really good and honest. The profits will be used for covering family expenses and for savings.

loans.use: to purchase onions, oil, sugar, soap, and rice

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro, de 49 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora y honesta, que debido a la situación económica que tenían sus padres, no pudo asistir a la escuela; está acompañado y tiene una hija de 18 años de edad, 

Pedro, tiene un puesto de verduras en el mercado desde hace 4 años, de esa manera obtiene ingresos para poder comprar lo necesario para su familia y poder ayudar a su hija para que estudie y pueda salir adelante.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar verduras e invertir más en mercadería para su negocio, la demanda que actualmente tiene es mayor, es por eso que necesita la ayudad del préstamo para poder comprar la mercadería y satisfacer a los clientes.

Pedro, sueña con tener su puesto de venta más surtido y ayudar a su hija para que estudie y sea profesional.
texts.en:
49-year-old Pedro is a hard-working and honest person. Due to his parents' economic situation, he wasn't able to attend school. He is in a relationship and has an 18-year-old daughter.

For 4 years, Pedro has had a vegetable stand in the market. This is how he makes income to be able to buy what his family needs and help his daughter, so that she can go to school and succeed in life.

He needs the loan to buy vegetables and invest more in merchandise for his business. His current demand is high, so he needs the help of the loan in order to buy the merchandise and satisfy his customers.

Pedro dreams of having a better-stocked stand, and of helping his daughter to study and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and invest in more merchandise for his business

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es: Ana de 34 años de edad que habita en casa propia en compañía de su hijo de 14 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo ha sacado adelante a su hijo, gracias a que posee una tienda en la que vende una gran variedad de productos como recargas de celulares, golosinas, bebidas, es así como logra generar sus ingresos económicos. Ana desea adquirir más variedad de productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes y es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en adquirir nuevos productos como: sandalias, pan dulce, variedad de golosinas, bebidas, ropa interior femenina, etc., para brindarles muchas más variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ana is 34 years old, and lives in her own home accompanied by her 14-year-old son. She is a hardworking woman that, with much effort, has provided for her son. Thankfully, she has a store in which she sells a variety of products such as cell phone calling cards, sweets, and drinks. It is through this that she is able to generate income.

Ana wishes to acquire more variety of products to offer to her customers. It is for that that she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in new products such as: sandals, sweet bread, a variety of sweets, drinks, women's interior garments, etc., to offer much more variety to her clients.

loans.use: to invest in new products such as: sandals, sweet bread, a variety of sweets, drinks, women's interior garments, etc.

loans.name: Rubenia

texts.es: Rubenia de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la confeccion de ropa desde hace 2 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes pero como no posee de suficiente capital esta solicitando un credito para la compra de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para poder tener una mejor vivienda.
texts.en:
Rubenia is 51 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She has been working as a tailor for the past 2 years. With what she earns from her sales, she is able to cover her household expenses.

She wishes to improve her home by plastering the walls. However, because she does not have enough capital, she is requesting a loan to buy the cement, sand, and pay for the labor, in order to have a better home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and payment for labor.

loans.name: Myriam

texts.fr:
Myriam  est une femme courageuse et travailleuse de  de 45 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de quatre enfants de 10 à  24 ans. L'ainée l'aide dans l'exercice de son activité, le second et le troisième suivent des formations professionnels en couture et en opérateur de saisi, tandis que le dernier est en classe de 6ème.
Elle est couturière de formation, c'est pourquoi elle choisissait de la pratiquer pour gagner sa vie. Son mari aussi est couturier. Elle a commencé à pratiquer en 1989. Elle s'est spécialisée dans la confection des sacs dames. C'est une femme débrouillarde, c'est elle-même qui crée les modèles. 
Son rêve le plus cher est d'avoir sa propre maison, la construire par le biais de ses propres efforts. Elle voudrait aussi une vie meilleure pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Myriam is a courageous and hard-working woman, 45 years old, and the married mother of four children, aged 10 to 24. The oldest helps her to operate her business. The second and third are taking professional training in tailoring and in data processing, while the last is attending the 6th grade.

Myriam is a trained seamstress. This is why she chose to practice it in order to earn a living. Her husband is a clothier too. She began working in 1989. Her speciality is in making women’s handbags. This is a woman who knows how to figure things out. She herself creates the different types and styles.

Her greatest dream is to have her own house built through her own efforts. She would also like a better life for her children.

loans.use: to purchase faux leather, magnetic snaps, and zippers

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 63 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el caserío El horno, distrito de Bagua que se encuentra em la región Amazonas, en la selva norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Antonio se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz , cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de varios años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de arroz así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Antonio espera ofrecer un arroz de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Antonio is 63 years old. He lives with his spouse and his children in their own rustic house in the village El Horno, in the district of Bagua, located in the Amazon region, in the northern jungle of Peru. The life in this district is calm. The villages make a living principally in agriculture, commerce, and raising livestock.

Antonio makes a living in agriculture, specifically in rice cultivation. He has several years of experience in the field, with very good personal and professional references from the area. The loan will be granted for use in the purchase of compost and fertilizers in order to perform proper maintenance of the rice crop as well as for hiring labor for the harvest season. With this, Antonio hopes to offer better quality rice to his customers, which will have a positive impact on his level of income and thus improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers in order to perform proper maintenance of rice crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in potatoes, cassava, vegetables, dough, etc...

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy: bread, a variety of vegetables to make prepared foods, cucumbers, chili, corn dough, rice, beans, etc.

loans.name: Sahara Leonor

texts.es: Sahara de 24 años de edad que habita en casa alquilada en compañía de su hermana y cuñado. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se gana la vida vendiendo comida y posee un puesto en el que vende medicinas de esa manera genera sus ingresos económicos con los que ha salido adelante y con los que lleva todo los insumos necesarios a su hogar. Sahara desea mejorar las ventas de su negocio adquiriendo más variedades de productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: jarabe para la tos, algodón, vitaminas, alcohol, acetaminofén, etc., para brindarles una variedad de productos a sus clientes y poder incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Sahara is 24 years old and she lives in a rented house with her sister and brother-in-law.  She is a hardworking woman who earns her living selling prepared foods and she has a stall where she sells medicines.  This is how she generates the income she uses to get ahead and to provider her household with everything it needs.  Sahara wants to improve sales at her business by getting more varieties of products to offer to her customers, which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy: cough syrup, cotton, vitamins, alcohol, acetaminophen, etc. to offer her customers a variety of products and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy: cough syrup, cotton, vitamins, alcohol, acetaminophen, etc.

loans.name: Dern's Group

texts.en: Dern’s group live in a rural village in Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. Dern makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as tailor and construction worker to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Channa's Group

texts.en: Channa’s group live in a rural village in Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. Channa makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as tailor and seller to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Neang's Group

texts.en: Neang’s group live in a rural village in Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. Neang makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men and woman to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Nayda

texts.en:
Nayda is 48 years old and married with seven children. With two children in school, Nayda works very hard to provide for them.

Nayda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, junk foods, home product care, and other groceries.

Nayda has been in this business for 1 year and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Nayda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, junk foods, home product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is 53 years old and has four children. Flordeliza is widowed and has one child in school.

Flordeliza is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Flordeliza requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Flordeliza has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Flordeliza would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es: Rosa de 37 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 2, 9 y 19 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que posee un negocio en el que vende recargas para teléfonos, ropa para dama, celulares, etc., es así como genera sus ingresos económicos con los ha sacado adelante a sus hijos y con lo que brinda todos los insumos básicos para su hogar. Rosa desea mejorar sus ingresos económicos por lo que quiere adquirir más variedad de productos para ofréceles a sus numerosos clientes que gracias a su amabilidad posee, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: nueva variedad de zapatos, ropa para damas, papelería, celulares, venta de recargas, etc., para diversificar sus productos de su negocio y mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Rosa is 37 years old and lives in her own home together with her husband and their three children, who are 2, 9, and 19 years old.  She is a hardworking woman who has a business selling cell phone credits, women's clothing, cell phones, etc., which is how she generates the income to provide for her children and to provide for her household's basic needs.  Rosa wants to improve her earnings, which is why she wants to get a wider variety of products to offer to her numerous customers, whom she has thanks to her courteousness.  This is why she's requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy: a new variety of shoes, women's clothing, stationery, cell phones, to sell cell phone credits, etc. to diversify her business's products and improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy:  a new variety of shoes, women's clothing, stationery, cell phones, to sell cell phone credits, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, el se dedica al cultivo de maiz y maicillo desde hace 12 años, comercializa sus prodcutos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes y mejorar el terreno donde desea realizar su siembra y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Miguel is 32 and lives in his own home with his life partner and their daughter.  He has been growing corn and sorghum for 12 years.  He sells his produce in the areas surrounding the community where he lives and with the earnings he makes he is able to cover some of his household expenses.  He is requesting a loan to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, and to improve the land where he wants to plan so he can make better profits.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizers, and to improve the land

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.en:
Gulchehra is a careful mother. She was born in northern part of Tajikistan in 1972. She is married and has four children. She is an assistant chef at catering “Rahmatjon”. She is responsible, honest, communicable and punctual person.

She appealed to IMON asking a loan to pay her daughter’s tuition fee. Her daughter studies Finance and Credit at university. She tries to educate and ensure her children. She wishes they would have a good knowledge and could find a well job place. She is awaiting Kiva enders kindness and compassion.

loans.use: loan will help her to pay costs of her daughter’s studies in Finance and Credit at university.

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Cristita is 36 years old and has six children who are in school.

Cristita has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. Cristita requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF to buy variety of fruit to sell in her business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Cristita has been in this business for 18 years. In the future, Cristita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy variety of fruit to sell in her business

loans.name: Alis

texts.es: Alis vive en Olanchito, Honduras tiene 25 años y aunque  es un hombre soltero aun, es muy trabajador y emprendedor, se dedica a la agricultura de maíz, Frijol y Café desde muy joven, trabaja muy fuerte todos los días, ya que en un futuro quiere formar su familia y necesita tener un buen patrimonio para que no le haga falta nada. Actualmente en la comunidad donde vive Alis no hay acceso a energía eléctrica por lo cual él tiene que caminar largar distancias para cargar su celular y también gasta mucho comprando velas y lámparas a base de kerosén, por estas razones Alis está solicitando un  préstamo a Soluz Honduras para adquirir un sistema solar y de esa manera  tener acceso a todos los servicios que la energía solar le ofrece, tales como buena iluminación y carga de celulares, de esta manera la vida de Alis  mejorara notablemente, su trabajo lo podrá realizar de una mejor manera y estará formando un patrimonio para su futura familia.
texts.en: Alis lives in Olanchito, Honduras.  He is 25 and though he is still single, he is very hardworking and enterprising.  He has grown corn, beans, and coffee for a living since he was very young.  He works very hard every day, as in the future he wants to have a family and he needs to have enough assets so that he will not want for anything.  The community where Alis lives currently does not have access to electricity, so he has to walk long distances to charge his cell phone and he also spends a lot of money on candles and kerosene lamps.  For these reasons, Alis is requesting a loan from Soluz Honduras to buy a solar power system so he can have access to all the services solar power offers, such as good lighting and cell phone charging.  This will improve Alis' life considerably; he will be able to better carry out his work; and he will be building a nest egg for his future family.

loans.use: to buy a solar power system, which will be a great benefit to his farm work and to living conditions in his home.

loans.name: Chea's Group

texts.en: Chea’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Chea makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Ana Consuelo

texts.es: Ana de 40 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 7, 10, y 12 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras con las que genera sus ingresos económicos y con lo ha sacado adelante a sus hijos y brindado una buena calidad de vida a su familia. Ana desea fortalecer su negocio adquiriendo nuevas variedades de frutas y verduras para ofrecerles a sus numerosos clientes es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: apio, repollos, pepinos, peras, uvas, fresas, etc., para mejorar los ingresos económicos y la variedad de los productos que le ofrece a sus numerosos clientes.
texts.en:
Ana is 40 years old and lives in her own house with her 3 children of 7, 10, y 12 years of age. She is an enterprising woman who works in fruit and vegetable sales, with which she generates her economic income. With this, she has continued forward with her children and offered a good quality of life to her family.

Ana wishes to strengthen her business by acquiring new types of fruits and vegetables to offer to her numerous customers. For this she is requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest in celery, cabbage, cucumbers, pears, grapes, strawberries, etc., in order to improve her economic income and the variety of products.

loans.use: to invest in celery, cabbage, cucumbers, pears, grapes, strawberry, etc.

loans.name: María Estela

texts.es: María de 40 años es habitante de una vereda ubicada en el municipio de Chocontá en el Departamento de Cundinamarca, ella ejerce la ganadería hace 20 años, actividad que heredó por tradición familiar; sus padres lograron solventar su hogar gracias a la cría de ganado vacuno y cultivos de diferentes tubérculo y hortalizas.  Ella enviudó y quedó a cargo de sus dos hijos a quienes les ha brindado bienestar con el fruto de su trabajo.  Diariamente ella recolecta leche que vende a camiones que llegan hasta su finca y como la demanda se está haciendo cada vez mayor, necesita comprar una vaca para aumentar la producción, para ello está aplicando a su primer crédito con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  Su meta de negocio es ampliar su producción lechera y a futuro trasladarse a vivir en el pueblo para ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y lograr educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old and lives in a village located in the town of Chocontá, in the department of Cundinamarca. She has been working in cattle for 20 years, a job that she inherited through family tradition. Her parents managed to support the home thanks to breeding beef cattle and different tuber crops and vegetables. She is a widow and was left in charge of her two children, who she has given wellbeing with the fruits of her work.

Every day she gathers the milk to sell to trucks that come to her farm. Demand is getting greater, so she needs to buy a cow to increase production. For that, she is applying for her first loan with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. Her business goal is to increase milk production, and in the future she wants to move to live in a town to offer a better quality of life and education to her children.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Las Maravillosas_74 Group

texts.es:
Yaderi es una mujer de 27 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 5 años, y su negocio es la bisutería. 
Ella es buena madre, paciente, y muy emprendedora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘mutualista’ área central, donde existe mucho movimiento comercial. 
Yaderi es de piel morena, baja estatura y físico robusto. Su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español (la primera de la derecha, viste polera blanca). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica a la construcción y con sus hijos que aún no se encuentran en edad escolar, viven en un cuarto alquilado construido de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. La necesidad por cubrir los gastos de sus hijos la llevó a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de comida, taller de llaves, artesanía en cuero, fabricación de sombreros, venta de ropa de segunda mano, venta de refrescos y venta de fruta.
